name: VERSATIL OPERA Marketplace
description: The first 100% native Claude SDK plugin with compounding engineering, anti-hallucination, and automatic agent activation
author: VERSATIL Team

plugins.name: versatil-opera-framework
plugins.description: The first AI framework with 100% native Claude SDK integration, featuring 21 specialized OPERA agents, automatic compounding engineering via CODIFY phase, and Victor-Verifier anti-hallucination system with assessment engine. 2.5x faster by Feature 5 with zero manual commands.
features: ✅ Automatic Compounding Engineering (CODIFY via Stop hook)
✅ Works in Claude Code + Cursor (zero config)
✅ Backend: Node.js, Python, Rails, Go, Java specialists
✅ Frontend: React, Vue, Next.js, Angular, Svelte specialists
✅ 11 MCP integrations (Chrome, GitHub, Vertex AI, etc.)

highlights.firstNative: First framework with 100% native Claude SDK integration
highlights.compoundingEngineering: Automatic CODIFY phase (inspired by Every Inc)

quickStart.demo: Edit any test file to see agents auto-activate
